string.text: An electronic clock, calibrated by some of the Zone's skilled technicians. The device counts down to a 'Blowout' or 'Emission', and alerts the user with a visual alert and an audible warning.\nIt comes with a standard clock, timer, and stopwatch, so no need to switch on your PDA to see the time.\nLightweight and easy to use, even in the dark or wearing gloves
